item.title: Vermont Trip 2020
item.description: My friend John camps yearly at the Little River State Park near Waterbury, Vermont. We booked two sites back in September of 2019, intending to camp there together with our partners. He could not join us due to COVID, but my spouse and I decided to go anyway. Travelling during COVID is stressful. Travelling to Vermont was easier - when we arrived, it was the only “green” state in the US with regards to COVID prevalence.

item.title: Twitter Bot: Professor 59X
item.description: UPenn MCIT program twitter bot. MCIT courses have numbering convention 59(X). Maintained by @logan_ayliffe . Code @ github: https://bit.ly/2RHtAes

item.title: Website: CIT59x
item.description: CIT59x is a website for the University of Pennsylvania MCIT program student group. I am technical lead for the group and co-founder. This site is built in Hugo with continuous deployment via github + netlify.
